data.eml:eml: Protopolybia aliciae, a new polistine social wasp from Brazilian Amazonia (Hym., Vespidae, Polistinae, Epiponini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silveira, Orlando Tobias (2004): Protopolybia aliciae, a new polistine social wasp from Brazilian Amazonia (Hym., Vespidae, Polistinae, Epiponini). Zootaxa 598: 1-5, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158513
